title: How to create an Authentication Token in Astra DB
description:
Creating a token is necessary for working with APIs or drivers connecting to your Astra DB database.

transcript.text: [Music] now i'm going to show you how to create a token i'm going to click the drop down in the top left head over to organization settings token management and here we can select our role if you're unsure which role to select you can always choose admin user that will give you the most permissions that are available if you are working with an api or a driver it will let you know which role you need to set for this case we're going to use the admin user and we're going to hit generate token you'll see you have your client id client secret and token you can use the client id and client secret when you connect using the driver and the token is for connecting with the apis you can download a csv file here that contains these authentication values this will disappear when you navigate away from the page you
